item.title: Cursed fields
item.description: The brave adventurer has arrived in strange fields. It’s shone with emerald light and time seemes to go faster and faster here. The traveler look at his watch and see that the arrows are turning at a breakneck pace. It might be he got slower. Suddenly he felt hunger and began to go even more slower. … But… look at that… Here it is the boundary of the field. Green light begins to fade, but hunger is still here.
